results.idea: Short-term momentum on recent returns
results.description: Used SUGGESTION1 by combining price returns over two horizons. SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3: assume coverage high for price so no ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: chooses common fields (close) with high user/alphaCount. Kept KEEP_IN_MIND1-4: implementation is short, uses 2 datafields max (only close), and <=7 operators. Confidence set to 0.65 based on typical momentum robustness.

results.idea: Mean-reversion on 1-week z-score of returns
results.description: SUGGESTION1: used single strong field (close) to keep signal clean. SUGGESTION2 not used. SUGGESTION3: price coverage assumed high so skipped ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: chose high-use price field. Kept KEEP_IN_MIND constraints. Confidence 0.6 reflecting mean-reversion moderate reliability.

results.idea: Volume-weighted momentum (returns * volume surge)
results.description: SUGGESTION1 applied: combine close and volume. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3: if volume coverage <0.6, apply ts_backfill (not shown to keep implementation short). SUGGESTION4: both fields usually high userCount. Respects KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence 0.62 due to added liquidity confirmation.

results.idea: Breakout from 1-month volatility contraction
results.description: SUGGESTION1 used close and ts_std_dev(close,20) as volatility proxy. SUGGESTION2 not used. SUGGESTION3: price high coverage. SUGGESTION4: chosen fields common. KEEP_IN_MINDs followed. Confidence 0.58; breakouts less stable but exploitable.

results.idea: Implied vs realized volatility divergence
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine implied_vol and realized (ts_std_dev of returns). SUGGESTION2 not used. SUGGESTION3: if implied_vol sparse, use ts_backfill; noted in description. SUGGESTION4: prefer widely-used implied vol field. KEEP_IN_MINDs upheld. Confidence 0.55 due to option data noisiness.

results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine bid_ask_spread and volume. SUGGESTION2 not used. SUGGESTION3: if spread coverage low, apply ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: chose common microstructure fields. Kept implementation short. Confidence 0.5; microstructure signals fragile across regimes.
